mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO OPAS_YDJ_ENHANCE_COLLECT
INSIDE_APP_NO, APP_ID, STAFF_NATURE, EXECUTIVE_LEVEL, UNIT_NATURE, ORG_AUTH_STRENGTH, ORG_LEVEL, INSTITUTION_AUTH_STRENGTH, INSTITUTION_LEVEL, SCHOOL_NATURE, SCHOOL_TYPE, SCHOOL_POSITION_LEVEL, HOSPITAL_NATURE, HOSPITAL_LEVEL, HOSPITAL_GRADE, DOCTOR_LEVEL, INDUSTRY_TYPE, IS_AFFILIATES, BANK_STAFF_TYPE, BANK_STAFF_LEVEL, PRIVATE_BUSINESS_TYPE, FINANCES_CUST, WUHANCZ_TYPE,
SPECIAL_CUST, MBA_SCHOOL_NAME, EDU_CERTIF_TYPE, EDU_BACK_TYPE, EDU_BACK, HOUSE_PROVE_TYPE, HOUSE_PROVE_NUM, HOUSE_AREA, HOUSE_TOTLE_PRICE, HOUSE_LOCATION, HOUSE_REPAY_TIME, VEHICLE_PROVE_TYPE, VEHICLE_HAND_TYPE, VEHICLE_TOTAL_PRICE, VEHICLE_AGE, INDUSTRY_CODE, POSITION_CODE, COMPANY_ESTABLISH_DATE, REGISTERED_CAPITAL, COMPANY_ENTRY_DATE, REAL_MONTH_INCOME, ADOPT_MONTH_INCOME, ADOPT_ITEM_ID,
VERIFRY_CLEAN_LOAN_DEBT, VERIFY_MORTGAGE_DEBT, VERIFY_CLEAN_LOAN_OPEN, CUST_EXPECT_CREDIT, APPLY_TERM, RATE, SYS_ADOPT_MONTH_INCOME, CRT_DATE, CRT_USER, LST_UPD_DATE, LST_UPD_USER,
#{insideAppNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{appId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{staffNature,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{executiveLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{unitNature,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{orgAuthStrength,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{orgLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{institutionAuthStrength,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{institutionLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{schoolNature,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{schoolType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{schoolPositionLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{hospitalNature,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{hospitalLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{hospitalGrade,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{doctorLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{industryType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{affiliates,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{bankStaffType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{bankStaffLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{privateBusinessType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{financesCust,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{wuHanCzType,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{specialCust,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{mbaSchoolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eduCertifType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{eduBackType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{eduBack,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{houseProveType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{houseProveNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{houseArea,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{houseTotalPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{houseLocation,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{houseRepayTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{vehicleProveType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{vehicleHandType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{vehicleTotalPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{vehicleAge,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{industryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{positionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyEstablishDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{registeredCapital,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{companyEntryDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{realMonthIncome,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{adoptMonthIncome,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{adoptItemId,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{verifryCleanLoanDebt,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{verifryMortgageDebt,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{verifryCleanLoanOpen,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{custExpectCredit,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{applyTerm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rate,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{sysAdoptMonthIncome,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, SYSDATE, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, #{lastUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
UPDATE OPAS_YDJ_ENHANCE_COLLECT SET STAFF_NATURE=#{staffNature,jdbcType=CHAR}, EXECUTIVE_LEVEL=#{executiveLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, UNIT_NATURE=#{unitNature,jdbcType=CHAR}, ORG_AUTH_STRENGTH=#{orgAuthStrength,jdbcType=CHAR}, ORG_LEVEL=#{orgLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, INSTITUTION_AUTH_STRENGTH=#{institutionAuthStrength,jdbcType=CHAR}, INSTITUTION_LEVEL=#{institutionLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, SCHOOL_NATURE=#{schoolNature,jdbcType=CHAR}, SCHOOL_TYPE=#{schoolType,jdbcType=CHAR}, SCHOOL_POSITION_LEVEL=#{schoolPositionLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, HOSPITAL_NATURE=#{hospitalNature,jdbcType=CHAR}, HOSPITAL_LEVEL=#{hospitalLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, HOSPITAL_GRADE=#{hospitalGrade,jdbcType=CHAR}, DOCTOR_LEVEL=#{doctorLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, INDUSTRY_TYPE=#{industryType,jdbcType=CHAR}, IS_AFFILIATES=#{affiliates,jdbcType=CHAR}, BANK_STAFF_TYPE=#{bankStaffType,jdbcType=CHAR}, BANK_STAFF_LEVEL=#{bankStaffLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, PRIVATE_BUSINESS_TYPE=#{privateBusinessType,jdbcType=CHAR},
FINANCES_CUST=#{financesCust,jdbcType=CHAR}, WUHANCZ_TYPE=#{wuHanCzType,jdbcType=CHAR}, SPECIAL_CUST=#{specialCust,jdbcType=CHAR}, MBA_SCHOOL_NAME=#{mbaSchoolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EDU_CERTIF_TYPE=#{eduCertifType,jdbcType=CHAR}, EDU_BACK_TYPE=#{eduBackType,jdbcType=CHAR}, EDU_BACK=#{eduBack,jdbcType=CHAR}, HOUSE_PROVE_TYPE=#{houseProveType,jdbcType=CHAR}, HOUSE_PROVE_NUM=#{houseProveNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, HOUSE_AREA=#{houseArea,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, HOUSE_TOTLE_PRICE=#{houseTotalPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, HOUSE_LOCATION=#{houseLocation,jdbcType=CHAR}, HOUSE_REPAY_TIME=#{houseRepayTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, VEHICLE_PROVE_TYPE=#{vehicleProveType,jdbcType=CHAR}, VEHICLE_HAND_TYPE=#{vehicleHandType,jdbcType=CHAR}, VEHICLE_TOTAL_PRICE=#{vehicleTotalPrice,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, VEHICLE_AGE=#{vehicleAge,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
INDUSTRY_CODE=#{industryCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POSITION_CODE=#{positionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPANY_ESTABLISH_DATE=#{companyEstablishDate,jdbcType=DATE}, REGISTERED_CAPITAL=#{registeredCapital,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COMPANY_ENTRY_DATE=#{companyEntryDate,jdbcType=DATE}, REAL_MONTH_INCOME=#{realMonthIncome,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ADOPT_MONTH_INCOME=#{adoptMonthIncome,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ADOPT_ITEM_ID=#{adoptItemId,jdbcType=CHAR}, CUST_EXPECT_CREDIT=#{custExpectCredit,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, VERIFRY_CLEAN_LOAN_DEBT=#{verifryCleanLoanDebt,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, VERIFY_MORTGAGE_DEBT=#{verifryMortgageDebt,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, VERIFY_CLEAN_LOAN_OPEN=#{verifryCleanLoanOpen,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, APPLY_TERM=#{applyTerm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RATE=#{rate,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
CERTIFI_MATERIAL=#{certifiMaterial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK=#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_GROUP_TYPE=#{custGroupType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REAL_GROUP=#{realGroup ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALARY_MONTH_INCOME=#{salaryMonthIncome,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, TAX_MONTH_INCOME=#{taxMonthIncome,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, WORK_MONTH_INCOME=#{workMonthIncome,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, SOCIAL_SECURITY_MONTH_INCOME=#{socialSecurityMonthIncome,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, FUND_MONTH_INCOME=#{fundMonthIncome,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, SPOUSE_MONTH_INCOME=#{spouseMonthIncome,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, HOUSE_MONTH_INCOME=#{houseMonthIncome,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, SYS_ADOPT_MONTH_INCOME=#{sysAdoptMonthIncome,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, RANK_MONTH_INCOME=#{rankMonthIncome,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
LST_UPD_DATE=SYSDATE, LST_UPD_USER=#{lastUpdateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=CHAR}

UPDATE opas_ydj_enhance_collect
PBOC_MONTGAGE_DEBT=#{pbocMontgageDebt,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, PBOC_UNMONTGAGE_DEBT=#{pbocUnMontgageDebt,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, PBOC_CREDIT_DEBT=#{pbocCreditDebt,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, PBOC_UNMONTGAGE_OPEN=#{pbocUnmontgageOpen,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, CREDIT_OPEN=#{creditOpen,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
CERTIFI_MATERIAL=#{certifiMaterial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK=#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_GROUP_TYPE=#{custGroupType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REAL_GROUP=#{realGroup ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALARY_MONTH_INCOME=#{salaryMonthIncome,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, TAX_MONTH_INCOME=#{taxMonthIncome,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, WORK_MONTH_INCOME=#{workMonthIncome,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, SOCIAL_SECURITY_MONTH_INCOME=#{socialSecurityMonthIncome,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, FUND_MONTH_INCOME=#{fundMonthIncome,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, SPOUSE_MONTH_INCOME=#{spouseMonthIncome,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, HOUSE_MONTH_INCOME=#{houseMonthIncome,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, SYS_ADOPT_MONTH_INCOME=#{sysAdoptMonthIncome,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, RANK_MONTH_INCOME=#{rankMonthIncome,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
WHERE APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select to_date(add_months((select s.crt_time from opas_biz_inp_appl_c1 s where app_id=#{appId,jdbcType=CHAR}),-12*(select s.c1_coyr from opas_biz_inp_appl_c1 s where app_id=#{appId,jdbcType=CHAR}))) as entryYear from dual
select nvl(s.c1_coyr,0) from opas_biz_inp_appl_c1 s where s.app_id=#{appId,jdbcType=CHAR}
select requesttype from (select requesttype from opas_fico_big_response s where s.app_id=#{appId,jdbcType=CHAR} and s.requesttype='YDJ1008' order by s.lst_upd_date desc) where rownum=1
mapper.update: UPDATE OPAS_YDJ_ENHANCE_COLLECT SET ADOPT_ITEM_ID = NULL WHERE APP_ID = #{appId,jdbcType=CHAR}
